meanings.definition: A wild dog of Asia and Africa, resembling the wolf.
meanings.sent1: The pack of jackals hunted together in the savannah.
meanings.sent2: In the African plains, jackals can be heard howling at night.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous jackals played a game of chase with the hyenas.
meanings.sent4: The city streets at night were filled with jackals looking for scraps.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the jackals roaming freely in the wilderness was mesmerizing.
